food.title: Where can I eat?
food.desc: Da Lat is not just famous for its nature beauty that has been recognized many times worldwide but also for its authentic cuisine

more_info.name: Le Petit Dalat - Ana Mandara
more_info.location: 31 Mai Hắc Đế, Phường 6, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: Inspired by Western Europe, our fine dining international fusion restaurant and lounge bar embraces exceptional culinary diversity from around the globe.
more_info.menu: Bar, Fast Food, Pub, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options, Vegan Options

more_info.name: Le Rabelais Restaurant
more_info.location: 02 Trần Phú, Phường 3, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: We dined at Le Rabelais for a special occasion and were impressed with the customer service we received from the staff. The restaurant setting is beautiful and our meal was great. All in all an unforgettable experience.
more_info.menu: French, European, Asian, Contemporary, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Artist Alley Restaurant
more_info.location: 124/1 Phan Đình Phùng, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: This is a very unique restaurant, down an alley and up stairs to an interesting array of paintings decorating a series of rooms with various tables for most any group. Good wines, a fair beer selection, I had two fish dishes which were delicious. Menu accommodated vegetarian members on one evening. Well worth a look! The owner is a remarkably generous and kind person.
more_info.menu: Asian, Vietnamese, International, Fusion, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: M Bistro Café & Restaurant
more_info.location: 25 Trương Công Định, Đà Lạt 670000, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: The food was really good and there was some original dishes. The restaurant is very quiet, the background music is very relaxing, it’s so peaceful. Plus, the waiter is so kind and nice which enhance the whole experience, I recommend this bistrot!
more_info.menu: International, Vietnamese, Seafood, Fusion, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Chu Quan BBQ Grill
more_info.location: 3 Pham Ngu Lao St | Ward 3, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: We had the beef bbq and it was a different experience all together, the beef tasted great and the 3 extra dishes we ordered, the green vegetables, fried tofu and fried rice were of good size and tasty.
more_info.menu: Italian, Pizza, European, Asian, Vietnamese, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Wheel House Dalat Restaurant
more_info.location: 51 Trương Công Định, P.1, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Amazing food prepared in a tiny kitchen and everything freshly made , for sure trying out if you go to Da Lat
more_info.menu: Seafood, European, Asian, Vietnamese, Gastropub, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: Biang Bistro Restaurant
more_info.location: Số 2 Lý Tự Trọng, Phường 2, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Literally everything we ate was delicious. Each and every dish (from the fresh spring rolls to the wasabi corn) had a interesting and new flavour to us. The chef is cooking right next to your table. A must go in Da Lat
more_info.menu: Cafe, International, Healthy, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

more_info.name: French Touch Coffe
more_info.location: 41 Hai Bà Trưng | Phường 6, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: A very sweet cafe, lovely atmosphere, really yummy muesli with fresh banana and honey! The cats were so cute too! Thank you for a fab breakfast!
more_info.menu: French, Vietnamese, Cafe, Asian, Vegetarian Friendly, Gluten Free Options, Vegan Options

more_info.name: Da Quy Restaurant
more_info.location: 119 Phan Đình Phùng, Đà Lạt 61000, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Brilliant food and service. The owner is absolute G, good English and just so lovely. Would recommend this place if you’re visiting Dalat.
more_info.menu: Asian, Vietnamese, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options, Vegetarian Friendly

more_info.name: Hoang Anh Restaurant
more_info.location: 1000 Nguyễn Thị Nghĩa, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Very good (organic!) ingredients and a very friendly and helpful staff that kindly showed us how to correctly eat that dish.
more_info.menu: Italian, Bar, Pizza, Asian, Vietnamese, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options

place.title: Where can I visit?
place.desc: Da Lat has a lot of places to see and things to do, you will never be bored

more_info.name: Linh Phuoc Pagoda
more_info.location: 120 Tự Phước Thành Phố Đà Lạt, Phường 11, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: This pagoda is very impressive especially the intricate workmanship that has gone into making it. He if you need to use the toilet just beware that they are squat toilets. Lots of history and photo opportunities her. Well worth a visit

more_info.name: Elephant Falls
more_info.location: Gia Lâm, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: It was a nice visit to the waterfall, which was a part of a day trip with many stops. You can go down the base of the waterfall through a small cave, and experience up close how powerful the water stream is

more_info.name: Valley of Love
more_info.location: Phường 8, Đà Lạt
more_info.desc: The large garden that makes you fresh. You need to pay the entrance ticket to enjoy the colorful flower garden. My recommendation for this place is suitable for own trip no tour guide. If you have time to spend in the garden it will fulfill and relax your soul.

more_info.name: Lam Vien Square
more_info.location: Phường 10, Đà Lạt
more_info.desc: Good place to walk around to stretch your legs. Also a good place for little kids to run around and having a good time.

more_info.name: Dalat Railway Station
more_info.location: Quang Trung, P10, Đà Lạt
more_info.desc: Interesting place to see historic train memorabilia. Inexpensive. Had a cup of coffee in one of the converted rail cars and wandered around for 30 minutes or so. Won’t take much time to see it all.

more_info.name: Cu Lan Village
more_info.location: ĐT722, Lát, Lạc Dương, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: Cu Lan village with the name of the meaning of foolish, foolish but really it is a worthy place to go. Here the air is always cool, sometimes a little cold. Old homes are retained by the people as a preserve of cultural quintessence. The freshness and romance will definitely make many people fall in love.

more_info.name: Lang Biang
more_info.location: tt Lạc Dương, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Lang Biang at 2187 m is a great hike. Moderate to hard ( last 350 mates ) are surely hard. Good to take a guide as the interesting path is through a forest and is easy to get lost

more_info.name: Tuyen Lam Lake
more_info.location: Phường 4, Dalat, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: Come here at early morning or at dawn to see the most beautiful moments at the lake. Besides, you can try some bbq house nearby the lake.

more_info.name: Dalat Park
more_info.location: 2 Trần Nhân Tông, Phường 8, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: We have visited this flowers farm in October 2018, fully recommend for those who like gardening, here planted many difference types of flowers we haven't seen before. Nice to have photograph here.

more_info.name: Valley of Lights
more_info.location: dốc số 7, Trại Mát, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: this valley the most even, it is so big alike the Love valley or the other parks in Dalat. Peacel, calm, beautiful scenery, some animals, especially the way to valley with 2 fences of straight pines!

shop.title: Where can I shop?
shop.desc: Da Lat is filled with places to shop from local markets to specialised stores

more_info.name: Dalat Market
more_info.location: Số 10 Phan Bội Châu, Phường 1, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng, Vietnam
more_info.desc: Definitely worth a walk around these markets. Lots to see and smell. Cheap clothes and souvenirs etc. A good experience to feel what the local markets are like. And to visit the 100 roof bar is so much fun. Buy a drink and get lost exploring all the crazy and funky tunnels to reach the top. Definitely a must do in Dalat

more_info.name: XQ Vietnam
more_info.location: 258 Mai Anh Đào, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: It is beyond what words could describe. I am so proud of Vietnamese people. They are so talented in many ways. I love the country so much.

more_info.name: 3D Trickland Museum
more_info.location: 3 Lê Thị Hồng Gấm, Phường 1, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: There are realistic paintings and over 10 themes of trick art zones and many things to adventure. Inside of this museum I can have pictures all over the world!!

more_info.name: Labata Handmade
more_info.location: 64 Phan Đình Phùng, Dalat, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Really enjoyed looking at all of the handmade goods in Labata! We bought some essential oils and did a bookbinding course where we learnt to make notebooks in the style sold in the shop. Great fun, definitely recommend!

more_info.name: Namsilk
more_info.location: 34 Trương Công Định, Phường 1, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: It is really interesting and really worth a look. I have been to other silk places in other countries, and found this a bit more authentic, a bit raw. It was good. What they have to offer for sale is quite reasonably priced.

more_info.name: DL Nature's
more_info.location: 125 Quốc lộ 20 | Tổ Lâm Văn Thạnh, Phường 11, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
more_info.desc: Prices are lower than those of Lang's Farm with similar quality.

more_info.name: L'angfarm Store
more_info.location: 1b Hoàng Văn Thụ, Phường 5, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: L'angfarm Store is a chain of specialty retail shops in Dalat that we directly build and operate in order to: Deliver Dalat specialty products that are safe, quality and beautiful; Carry standardized goods at the best controlled prices

more_info.name: Lavender Shop
more_info.location: 47 Bùi Thị Xuân, Phường 2, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Lavender flowers, vases, gift boxes, essential oils, fragrant bags, cosmetics from Lavender.

more_info.name: Laine Lana
more_info.location: 6 Lữ Gia, Phường 9, Dalat, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: GiftShop for resonable price

more_info.name: TG GiftShop
more_info.location: 7 Nhà Chung, Phường 4, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Another giftshop

hotel.title: Where can I stay?
hotel.desc: Da Lat has a large range of hotels, to enjoy you stay in comfort

more_info.name: ZEN Valley Dalat
more_info.location: 38 Khe Sanh, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: this place is a gem. It is located on a very picturesque side of Dalat. All is safe, clean and absolutely beautiful. There is a view out on to a lovely valley filled with pine trees.

more_info.name: Hang Nga Villa
more_info.location: 3 Huỳnh Thúc Kháng, Phường 4, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: This is arguably the most unique place one could stay. The staffs are incredibly friendly, and the room is cozy. The best part is you can explore through the buildings in quiet settings, before, or after the tourists are visiting. The downsides are 1. It's too dark in the room. 2. If you happen to stay in your room during public hours, visitors will try to open your door every 2 minutes which is really annoying after a while. However, the stay itself is very pleasant to top the negatives

more_info.name: Dalat BackPackers Hotel
more_info.location: 11 Hà Huy Tập, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: 100% Amazing trip, such a great day with great tour guides that give lots interesting information and stop off and show lots of things not just waterfalls, would recommend to everyone, best day in Vietnam

more_info.name: Dalat Sky Hotel
more_info.location: 27 Võ Thị Sáu, Phường 2, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Clean and friendly hostel. The family dinner was great fun. Central location, comfortable beds and good wifi. Highlight was the staff who were very welcoming and helpful. We went canyoning where they offer free spare runners and cleaning service. Cheap beer (15k) and ordered our taxi to the airport which we prepaid to avoid hostel. Big shootout to all of the staff! Would highly recommend!

more_info.name: Tiny Tigers Hotel
more_info.location: 77 Đoàn Thị Điểm, Phường 4, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Amazing stay amazing staff. Leo the owner is one of a kind he’s so welcoming family owned hostel . Leo’s bike tour highly recommend. Hostel really clean comfy beds nice blankets fluffy soft, good WiFi, nice showers

more_info.name: Sammy Dalat Hotel
more_info.location: 1 Lê Hồng Phong, Phường 4, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: It was romantic and charming. I loved the style and opulence. The staff were lovely and the breakfast was good. We were able to easily walk to the night markets which were great. DaLat is a beautiful place which I will happily return.

more_info.name: La Sapinette Dalat Hotel
more_info.location: 1 Phan Chu Trinh, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: it is a nice place to relax and enjoy, but it is quite far from night market and central area. The staffs were quite friendly and helpful but they were not professional enough for a 4-star hotel. The breakfast was poor, especially drinks. To sum up, we were enjoyed and really liked the room we stayed.

more_info.name: Monet Garden Villa
more_info.location: 3 Nguyễn Du, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Monet Gardens is a collections of French colonial villas refurbished to 4star+ standard, located in well kept grounds not far from the old railway station and about (2km) 10min taxi ride into central Dalat market street. Well appointed family rooms in classic style. Large restaurant and wedding/conference rooms. Smaller building houses Cafe/Bar. Friendly staff

more_info.name: Marguerite Hotel
more_info.location: 30 Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: Pretty nice hotel. Middle of the road. But with in walking distance to everything. Met the owner. Very welcoming to Americans. The coffee shop is even better across the street and is also very welcoming to Americans and English speaking

more_info.name: Ngoc Phat Hotel
more_info.location: 10 Hồ Tùng Mậu, Phường 3, Thành phố Đà Lạt, Lâm Đồng
more_info.desc: The location of the hotel is the best in dalat. All the facilities are as the colonial times. The grounds around the hotel are gorgeous. Thanks to the stuff there are doing a great job. Excellent breakfast
